member.name: T:LiteNetLib.NatPunchModule
member.summary: Module for UDP NAT Hole punching operations. Can be accessed from NetManager

member.name: T:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod
member.summary: Sending method type

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod.Unreliable
member.summary: Unreliable. Packets can be dropped, can be duplicated, can arrive without order.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod.ReliableUnordered
member.summary: Reliable. Packets won't be dropped, won't be duplicated, can arrive without order.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod.Sequenced
member.summary: Unreliable. Packets can be dropped, won't be duplicated, will arrive in order.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod.ReliableOrdered
member.summary: Reliable and ordered. Packets won't be dropped, won't be duplicated, will arrive in order.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.DeliveryMethod.ReliableSequenced
member.summary: Reliable only last packet. Packets can be dropped (except the last one), won't be duplicated, will arrive in order.

member.name: T:LiteNetLib.NetConstants
member.summary: Network constants. Can be tuned from sources for your purposes.

member.name: T:LiteNetLib.INetLogger
member.summary: Interface to implement for your own logger

member.name: T:LiteNetLib.NetDebug
member.summary: Static class for defining your own LiteNetLib logger instead of Console.WriteLine or Debug.Log if compiled with UNITY flag

member.name: T:LiteNetLib.NetManager
member.summary: Main class for all network operations. Can be used as client and/or server.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UnconnectedMessagesEnabled
member.summary: Enable messages receiving without connection. (with SendUnconnectedMessage method)

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.NatPunchEnabled
member.summary: Enable nat punch messages

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UpdateTime
member.summary: Library logic update and send period in milliseconds

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.PingInterval
member.summary: Interval for latency detection and checking connection

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.DisconnectTimeout
member.summary: If NetManager doesn't receive any packet from remote peer during this time then connection will be closed (including library internal keepalive packets)

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.SimulatePacketLoss
member.summary: Simulate packet loss by dropping random amount of packets. (Works only in DEBUG mode)

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.SimulateLatency
member.summary: Simulate latency by holding packets for random time. (Works only in DEBUG mode)

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.SimulationPacketLossChance
member.summary: Chance of packet loss when simulation enabled. value in percents (1 - 100).

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.SimulationMinLatency
member.summary: Minimum simulated latency

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.SimulationMaxLatency
member.summary: Maximum simulated latency

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UnsyncedEvents
member.summary: Events automatically will be called without PollEvents method from another thread

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UnsyncedReceiveEvent
member.summary: If true - receive event will be called from "receive" thread immediately otherwise on PollEvents call

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UnsyncedDeliveryEvent
member.summary: If true - delivery event will be called from "receive" thread immediately otherwise on PollEvents call

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.BroadcastReceiveEnabled
member.summary: Allows receive broadcast packets

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.ReconnectDelay
member.summary: Delay between initial connection attempts

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.MaxConnectAttempts
member.summary: Maximum connection attempts before client stops and call disconnect event.

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.ReuseAddress
member.summary: Enables socket option "ReuseAddress" for specific purposes

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.Statistics
member.summary: Statistics of all connections

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.EnableStatistics
member.summary: Toggles the collection of network statistics for the instance and all known peers

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.NatPunchModule
member.summary: NatPunchModule for NAT hole punching operations

member.summary: IPv6 support

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.MtuOverride
member.summary: Override MTU for all new peers registered in this NetManager, will ignores MTU Discovery!

member.name: F:LiteNetLib.NetManager.UseSafeMtu
member.summary: Sets initial MTU to lowest possible value according to RFC1191 (576 bytes)

member.name: M:LiteNetLib.NetManager.#ctor(LiteNetLib.INetEventListener,LiteNetLib.Layers.PacketLayerBase)
member.summary: NetManager constructor
member.param: Network events listener (also can implement IDeliveryEventListener)
Extra processing of packages, like CRC checksum or encryption. All connected NetManagers must have same layer.

member.name: M:LiteNetLib.NetManager.ManualUpdate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update and send logic. Use this only when NetManager started in manual mode
member.param: elapsed milliseconds since last update call

member.name: M:LiteNetLib.NetManager.ManualReceive
member.summary: Receive logic. It will call Receive events immediately without need to use PollEvents or UnsyncedEvents Use this only when NetManager started in manual mode
